description.value: Intrinsic understanding of weaves and wards allows you to perceive their structure, finding the patterns and logic behind their construction, locating their triggers and weaknesses

system.benefits: Can analyze magical wards and barriers. Make [[/check skill=arcane]] (opposed by ward creator's Arcana): 1 net success = identify ward type and triggering conditions; 2+ net successes = find safe bypass or temporary weakness. Attempting to dispel a ward costs 2 Energy and requires winning the opposed check
